Cryptocows

by Microtorg

The service allows you to buy an ability to control and feed a real animal on our farms. Can feed them, care about them sell if you like to. Also the service allows you to slaugher you animal and get a stake made of it in. But caring animals in a large responsibility. If you forgot to feed your cow in time it'll die.

We store it in your browser
